name: Need for Speed: Underground 2
description: Discover the living world of Need for Speed™ Underground 2. Taking place in a massive, free-roaming city featuring five distinct interconnected neighbourhoods, Need for Speed Underground 2 delivers an immersive experience. With the most comprehensive tuning options, all-new game modes, and the industry’s most sought-after cars, NFSU2 delivers the most authentic tuner experience ever. Explore the city and encounter rival racers who will school you in the ways of the underground. Fine-tune every aspect of your ride’s handling and performance, and create your own personalised car with hundreds of new visual customisations. All-new game modes add depth and variety while more than a dozen new cars and hundreds of aftermarket parts make Need for Speed Underground 2 the deepest, most authentic tuner experience ever.
